definition: to be put in charge of/to be responsible for/branched passage

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Shenhu town in charge of Enterprise Office official said.
sentences.chinese: 深沪镇分管企业办负责人表示。

sentences.english: You serve as an executive at state-owned enterprises in steel and communications.
sentences.chinese: 你在分管钢铁和通信的国企担当主管人员。

sentences.english: Responsibilities: Assist the Mayor in charge of informatization.
sentences.chinese: 分管工作:协助市长负责信息化工作。

sentences.english: In charge of the Provincial Department of Communications with Feng Jianshen, mainly responsible for operation.
sentences.chinese: 与冯健身同志共同分管省交通厅，侧重营运。

sentences.english: Dr. Smith is assigned to take charge of the department.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯大夫受命分管这个部门。

sentences.english: Assist in charge of Development and Reform Commission.
sentences.chinese: 协助分管市发展和改革委员会。

sentences.english: Certainly is Li Meng's vice minister that public security official's part takes care of national place hall work in the bureau.
sentences.chinese: 当然是公安部分管全国地方厅局工作的李盟副部长啦。

sentences.english: I deal with people there, the same as what I would do here.
sentences.chinese: 在那里我是分管人事工作的，点与我将里工作一样。

sentences.english: Assist the vice mayor Wang Jinyu in economic works.
sentences.chinese: 协助王金玉副市长分管经济工作。

sentences.english: In charge of Chenggong New Area Administrative Committee, Kunming Xindu Investment Co., Ltd..
sentences.chinese: 分管呈贡新区管委会，昆明新都投资有限公司。

sentences.english: In charge of Chenggong New Area Administrative Committee, Kunming Xindu Investment Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 分管呈贡新区管委会，昆明新都投资有限公司。

definition: working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
to be in charge of/to concentrate on
to hold several jobs at once/concurrent post/working part-time
to transfer/to move to another post
main job/day job/steady full-time job (as opposed to temporary or casual)/chief or principal post (as opposed to deputy)
